mil3.6.7:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.6.7:0.3_0: Not wanting to listening to the recitation of the Monastic Code.
mil3.6.7:1.2_0: “What, Nāgadatta, what is the difference between you and greed?”
mil3.6.7:1.3_0: “Great king, that which is attached to you.”
mil3.6.7:1.4_0: “Sir, what’s the point of attachment to which you’re neither approving?”
mil3.6.7:1.7_0: “Great king, after experiencing greed and tastes, he eats experiencing greed and taste, but without experiencing greed.”
mil3.6.7:3.1_0: The seventh section for recitation on greed is finished.
